useCase.name: Display Application Data
useCase.description: Display all data of an application and select specific application to view its data.

preconditions.precondition: User is logged in and has access to application data.

successEndConditions.condition: List of job applications is displayed, and specific application data is shown.

failureEndConditions.condition: Error occurs during the data retrieval process.

useCase.trigger: User requests to display all data of an application and selects a specific application.

mainSequence.step: User requests to display all data of an application.
List of job applications is displayed.
